Modifies player's control scheme of camera presets.

This command needs to be used together with {{cmd|camera}} command.

== Syntax ==
: <code>controlscheme <players: target> clear</code>
:: Clears the control scheme.
: <code>controlscheme <players: target> set <control scheme: controlscheme></code>
:: Sets the control scheme.

== Arguments ==
{{argument|be=1|players: target|CommandSelector<Player>}}
: Specifies the [[player]] that the control scheme will be modified.
: {{arg desc|be=CommandSelector<Player>}}

{{argument|be=1|control scheme: controlscheme|Enum}}
: Specifies the control scheme.
: {{arg desc|be=enum}}
: Must be one of the following:
:* {{cd|camera_relative}} — Move relative to the camera, keep the viewing angle horizontal and follow the direction of movement.
:* {{cd|camera_relative_strafe}} — Move relative to the camera, keep the viewing angle horizontal and follow the facing.
:* {{cd|locked_player_relative_strafe}} — Move relative to the player and follow the facing.
:* {{cd|player_relative}} — Move relative to the player, keep the viewing angle horizontal and follow the direction of movement.
:* {{cd|player_relative_strafe}} — Move relative to the player, keep the viewing angle horizontal and follow the facing.
